Articles.Content:
I go and build another hill

my hill

I pick up your hill, flip it over, and stick it in my crater. I then build another hill on top of it. No hill for you.

My hill.

I bombard your hill with endless waves of HEYAHYEAHYEAHYEAH. 

You die of insanity

Mah hill

I fill your hill with a bunch of Euclid- and Keter-class SCPs.

My Hill 19.

\*dies of singular reference overdose\*

Flees the scen with SCP-197(6?)(i think(troll doll i think) in hot pursut

suddenly i turn around with desert eagle shoot it and claim its corpse as my hill

my hill

I drop a nuke on your hill and make a new one.

(This reminds me of a game on another forum called "Steal the cookie"...)

MY HILL

A spy stab you

My TF2 hill

I send in the Lighter Brigade.

Mph mmph.

I call in Soundwave to attack.

My Decepticon hill.

I bring Rainbow Dash(youtube refrence)

Mai hill now.

I drop another hill on top of yours.

My two-high hill.

I nuke the top hill.

My ordinary hill

I move in with you and slowly take over as your annoying room mate

My hill.

I take over your body.

My hill and new body.

I call the exorcist!

My demons-free hill

I call in the bunny army.

MY HILL

I call in a single coyote and your bunny army disperses.

My Hill

I call in the tortodrone army and say to them:

--. ...-- - / .... .---- --

I move to kansas and claim a hill

My hill

I fire the Mainsail.

My hill.

I assault your hill with endless pony pictures. You die of insanity

My hill.

I use ADblock

My pony-free hill

I use a loudspeaker to force you listening to ad.

Furthermore, I raise an army of pony and take your hill.

My pony-full and ad-full hill.

I get a engine with infinite engine power and Blow you bunker off the hill and build a bunker of Minecraft bedrock with no door with Anti MLP cultists guarding it not that I'm anti MLP

My hill

**Edited <time datetime="2013-11-01T00:08:55Z" title="11/01/2013 12:08  AM" data-short="10 yr">November 1, 2013</time> by Dooz**

Kill the garde with some snipers ([ponies snipers](http://th06.deviantart.net/fs70/PRE/i/2012/159/d/2/sketch__fluttershy_with_sniper_rifle_by_tunskaa-d52r2lk.png), to be ironic) and put another hill on the top.

My hill-with-a-guy-trapped-inside-a-bedrock-house-inside
